text: Lambeau Field is a stadium in Green Bay, Wisconsin. The stadium is home to the Green Bay Packers, an American football team that plays in the National Football League. The stadium is named after the Packers' founder Curly Lambeau. ==References== ==Other websites== * Lambeau Field at Packers.com Category:Football stadiums in the United States Category:Green Bay Packers Category:Buildings and structures in Wisconsin Category:1957 establishments in the United States Category:20th-century establishments in Wisconsin
title: Lambeau Field
